SELECT A.*, IFNULL(M.name, "삭제된_회원") AS extra__writer FROM article AS A LEFT JOIN member AS M ON A.memberId = M.id WHERE A.id = #{id} AND A.delStatus = 0

AND A.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword} ,'%')
AND A.`body` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword} ,'%')
AND (A.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword} ,'%') OR A.`body` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword} ,'%'))
AND A.delStatus = 0
